archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Guy Di Carlo, Jr. Civil War Research Papers, 1862-2002, n.d.
did.abstract: The Guy Di Carlo, Jr., Civil War Research Papers consist of newsletters, newspapers clippings, photographs, newspapers articles, photocopies from published literature, maps, and calendars, related to American Civil War topics.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from the Guy Di Carlo, Jr. Civil War Research Papers must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Guy Di Carlo, Jr. Civil War Research Papers, Ms1995-015, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Guy Di Carlo, Jr. Civil War Research Papers were donated to Special Collections in April 1995. Addition materials were donated in 2003, 2004, 2006, and 2007.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the original donation from the Guy Di Carlo, Jr. Civil War Research Papers commenced and was completed in 1996. Additional description was completed several times between 2003 and 2009 as more materials were donated.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The Guy Di Carlo, Jr., Civil War Research Papers consist of newsletters, newspapers clippings, photographs, newspapers articles, photocopies from published literature, maps, and calendars, related to American Civil War topics. The collection also contains audio and videocassettes from Civil War events and television. Many of these are homemade.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by subject matter. Note: Civil War Round Table is abbreviated as CWRT throughout the "Contents List."
